mapper.select: select a.asName AS subjectName, a.memberId AS regName, a.asRegDate AS regDate, a.asCode AS subjectCode, a.asGCode AS subjectGCode, a.asUse AS isUse, a.asCorrect AS isCorrect, a.asYear AS applyYear FROM k3_tb_as AS a where asCode = #{subjectCode};
